paper_abstract: This paper investigates the general k-search problem, in which a player is to sell totally k units of some asset within n periods, aiming at maximizing the total revenue. At each period, the player observes a quoted price which expires before the next period, and decides irrecoverably the amount of the asset to be sold at the price. We present a deterministic online algorithm and prove it optimal for the case where k <= n - 1. For the other case where k >= n, we show by numerical illustration that the gap between the upper and the lower bound of competitive ratio is quite small for many situations. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Online algorithms for the general k-search problem
